hero_section.main_text: "Building bold digital experiences that speak for themselves."
hero_section.sup_main_text: Frontend Developer • UI Enthusiast • Creative Coder

main_content.main_text: Hi, I’m Nehan Zafar — a web developer passionate about building clean, responsive, and engaging web experiences.
main_content.quoteText: I'm passionate about crafting intuitive, visually engaging websites that blend design and development. I enjoy turning ideas into clean, responsive interfaces — combining creative design with solid, maintainable code to deliver smooth, user-focused experiences.
